reasoning: MDS global incidence ~4 per 100k overall population, but strongly age-dependent (15-50 per 100k in adults >70). Well-documented in cancer registries including SEER and European registries.
source: Ma X et al. (2007). Epidemiology of myelodysplastic syndromes. Am J Med. 120(7 Suppl 1):S2-10
